member.summary: RodClevis_Validation Function::::: If Double Lug configuration is selected with Threaded Connection Type at RodEnd then the function returns1 else 0

member.summary: ToolB_Validation Function::::: If Stroke Length is less than 6 then the function returns 1 else 0

member.name: M:Monarch_WeldedCylinder_01_09_09.clsCostingExcelFunctionality.Bushing_Validation
member.summary: Bushing_Validation Function::::: This Function adds the Number of bushings selected at the BaseEnd and RodEnd and returns the added value

member.name: M:Monarch_WeldedCylinder_01_09_09.clsCostingExcelFunctionality.NumberOfPorts
member.summary: NumberOfPorts Function::::: This function adds the NUMBER OF PORTS selected at both BaseEnd and RodEnd and returns the added value.

member.name: M:Monarch_WeldedCylinder_01_09_09.clsCostingExcelFunctionality.Breather
member.summary: Breather Function::::: If Port Accessory Type is BREATHER at both BaseEnd and RodEnd the function returns 2, if Breather is selected at any one end then it returns 1, if no breather selected then it returns 0.

member.name: M:Monarch_WeldedCylinder_01_09_09.clsCostingExcelFunctionality.ThreadProtectorOnRod
member.summary: ThreadProtectorOnRod Function::::: If Threaded Rod Configuration is selected at RodEnd side then the function returns 'Y' (yes) else 'n' (no)

member.name: M:Monarch_WeldedCylinder_01_09_09.clsCostingExcelFunctionality.BothPortsSameSize
member.summary: BothPortsSameSize Function::::: If Port Sizes at BaseEnd and RodEnd are same then the function returns 'Y' else 'N'

member.name: M:Monarch_WeldedCylinder_01_09_09.clsCostingExcelFunctionality.Ports_90Degrees
member.summary: Ports_90Degrees Function::::: If Port Angle is 90 at either BaseEnd or RodEnd side then the function returns 'Y' else 'N'

member.name: M:Monarch_WeldedCylinder_01_09_09.clsCostingExcelFunctionality.NPTPorts
member.summary: NPTPorts Function::::: If Port Type is 'NPTF' at either BaseEnd or RodEnd side then the function returns 'Y' else 'N'

member.name: M:Monarch_WeldedCylinder_01_09_09.clsCostingExcelFunctionality.AngleBetweenPorts
member.summary: AngleBetweenPorts Function::::: Based on the Number of Ports selected on BaseEnd and RodEnd side the Port orientation Values are passed to the functions called to calculate the difference between the angles.
